name: SSF4
title: Site-Specific Factor 4
subtitle: Size of Lymph Nodes
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code the largest diameter, whether measured clinically or pathologically, of any involved regional lymph node(s). 
* Do not code the size of any distant lymph node(s).

**Note 2:**  Record only for squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid.  
* For other histologies, code 987, not applicable.
rows: Not applicable, not squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
Microscopic focus or foci only and no size of focus given
Described as "less than 2cm" or "greater than 1cm" or between 1cm and 2cm"
Described as "less than 3cm" or "greater than 2cm" or "between 2cm and 3cm"
Described as "less than 4cm" or "greater than 3cm" or "between 3cm and 4cm"
Described as "less than 5cm" or "greater than 4cm" or "between 4cm and 5cm"
Described as "less than 6cm" or "greater than 5 cm" or "between 5cm and 6cm"

Regional lymph node(s) involved, size not stated
Unknown if regional lymph node(s) involved
Not documented in patient record
